phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
We cannot handle something that big!
First of all, we have to get the kids out of here.
Kids, take turns riding out of here on that!
It will take at least ten or twenty minutes to get them all out of here.
We have to hold this thing back until then.
I will not let you get near them!
Y-You do not know who I am?
You have not taken responsibility for any of this yet!
I am not letting you die until you do!
You are trying to kill your own brother?!
Looks like my sword's working, so I am just going to quickly take care of
Now your anti-magic will not be able to defeat him so easily!
The dark magic item I just injected him with eats the subject's life force
and produces an explosion of magical power!
There is no end to this!
Aw, you got in the way again!
I am not interested in an old lady whose magic's all dried up.
Looks like you have got a mouth on you, whippersnapper.
It is true that as you get older, the magic you can generate internally weakens.
But the power to work with the mana that dwells
in nature can be increased at any age.
I have years of experience and technique.
I will not lose to a youngster like you!
Do not you dare underestimate us old hags!
Jeez, you are an annoying old lady, are not you?
Do not blame me if you kick the bucket today.
I cannot fight well while protecting the kids as they escape.
This is only going to get worse.
How could he run off like that?!
I am taking you back into town.
Not only does my magic not work on that woman,
but an insanely powerful magical monster appeared, too.
You will be in danger if I fight that thing!
I do not care what happens to the others, as long as you are all right.
The House of Adlai is a distinguished noble family that anyone would envy.
Little Gauche looks as dignified as his father!
And little Marie is as beautiful as her mother!
So, about you helping me with my business...
They were attacked by some robbers after leaving my office.
It is written in their will that they left
their fortune and everything they owned to me.
I will protect Marie, no matter what it takes!
As long as Marie is smiling, I do not need anything else.
Give me all the cash you have.
Nobles should help out the needy.
You will be paying for all of your crimes!
Like I care about other people!
I hate having a big brother who is so pathetic!
It is true that a lot of people did some awful things to us.
But Sister and the kids at the church are different!
The only reason I was not lonely when you were not with me was because of them!
That is how you became a Magic Knight, too!
We are who we are because they are here!
Besides, it is your job as a Magic Knight to protect everyone.
I am really proud that you are a Magic Knight!
Please just be the cool big brother I am proud of!
Asta lent it to me so I would not feel lonely while he went to go save everyone else.
He said it had the courage of a Magic Knight in it.
Brother, I will wait here with Marco.
You would better mean that, you stupid little brat.
I will make you pay if anything happens to Marie.
I am so glad you are safe!
We managed to get away with Sister's magic.
Asta protected us, but that monster's really strong!
My brother's going to fight with them.
My brother's a Magic Knight just like Asta, after all.
So he must be really strong!
Marie, make sure you stay hidden.
What is so great about that shrimp, anyway?
The captain and the other squad members would not shut up about him,
but he immediately got caught by that woman!
I am sure he and that old hag gave up and ran away.
When you get down to it, people only care about themselves!
Why do not you stop protecting them and let me catch you already?
And I am not going to die until I become the Wizard King!
You yelled something stupid like I am not going to die,
and then you actually almost died.
Why did you run off like that?
He finally came back, that fool.
I will deal with you myself!
You joining in is not going to help!
I am going to fight... for the sake of Marie's love!
And so she will say I am cool!
Magic keeps bubbling up from it, and it regenerates immediately.
My magic is not even touching that woman.
I have not been this incompatible with an opponent since the captain.
Should I use my trump card?
No matter how strong my mirror magic becomes, it will not help.
I thought you came to help!
What are you doing charging in all by yourself?!
We are supposed to be a team!
Then we will be able to fight forever!
An epic strategy, if I do say so myself!
What kind of half-baked strategy is that?
This guy really is an idiot.
Come to think of it, he was pretty half-baked, too.
You really want to keep going?
You are not going to be able to run.
Well, if she is that important, join my squad and support her.
I do not trust others, and I only think about my sister.
You just protect what you want to protect.
Someday, that will help somebody out.
Captain, did you know this would happen someday?
Granny, how many kids are left?
I guess I do not have a choice.
Marie will be sad if you all die.
What are you acting all tough for?
You need to learn how to talk to your seniors!
And something is shining over there.
The only way to defeat that monster
is to hit it with so many attacks at once that it does not have time to regenerate.
The most effective strike was the slash Asta just hit it with,
but he cannot launch enough of them.
What would happen if I used my magic on someone else?
Because Gauche had always preferred to act alone and did not trust others,
he would never thought of using his magic to support someone else.
But due to his past failures and his reluctant acknowledgment of Asta,
he was able to create a spell that was
and engraved a new page in his grimoire.
But I will not be able to activate this spell with the magic I have now.
You need to learn how to treat old hags.
I will only last a minute, so make it fast!
Leftover magic like that is not going to work at all.
You do not have to tell me!
I have been hiding this, but I will have to use it now.
I will use the magic accumulated in the mirror magic item in my left eye
It appears that he had all of his life force sucked out.
How long are you going to keep crying, Neige?
Baro, I will not forgive her for turning you into this monster.
But the one I cannot forgive most of all
is myself for leaving everything to him and just doing what he said!
Just as you said, I have not taken responsibility for anything.
So I am going to pay for both of our crimes.
And when you are done with that, let us be buddies.
You can use really cool magic, so you would be really popular!
I have never felt something this huge
I did not... see a thing...
Are they attacking everything in sight?
He is the one that appeared at the enemy's hideout.
I guess I have not introduced myself yet.
I am the leader of the Eye of the Midnight Sun...
Leader of the Eye of the Midnight Sun Licht
I can do anything when Marie's around!
But there are times where I must steel my heart and decline Marie's wishes.
Brother, go back and save Asta and the others!
Going back would put you in danger!
I want to eat some hot, extra-cheesy doria!
Eating that would put your tongue in danger!
Brother, does not lying out in the sun feel nice?
If you are in the sun too long, your skin will be in danger!
UV rays are a fearsome enemy!
Brother, show me a really cool spell!
That is the guy who was at the Eye of the Midnight Sun hideout!
You are the one who attacked the Clover Kingdom and did that to Captain Fuegoleon...
I will make you regret that!
Black Clover, Page 34: Light Magic vs. Dark Magic.
Page 34 Light Magic VS Dark Magic
